short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A unique group chat on every webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Drivel is a free chat that lets you interact with other internet users based on the page you’re visiting –  live chat about any YouTube video, news article or Etsy shop with the click of a button.

The app is still in development - please send any feedback to hello@drivelchat.com
